website_summaries.verdict: Trustworthy brand name delivers a lint roller with extremely sticky tape.
pros: Tape is very sticky, yet it won't leave residue on delicate fabrics and surfaces
Sheets peel away easily when you're finished
Has a nicely curved handle that's comfortable to use for long periods of time
cons: Doesn't grab embedded fur and lint

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a pet owner so I buy these often. Can’t complain. I keep one in the car, one in the house.. they do the job well! Will buy again. If my review has helped you in any way, please click the "helpful" button below so that I know! If you have any questions feel free to ask! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: They are stickier.
customer_reviews.text: All of the lint rollers I've used are pretty much the same as to ergonomics, but these Pet Hair Rollers do seem stickier, picking up considerably more dog hair before I have to tear off a paper to access a new one. That means they pick up faster and a roll lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Willamettegirl

customer_reviews.title: The Good And The Bad
customer_reviews.text: The good is that it picks up cat hair nicely, that is on bedsheets, a smooth material. On stuff like sweaters where the cat hair sticks, it doesn't do a very good job. Only the very stickiest lint rollers can do that. The bad is that the sheets are difficult to separate and tear off mainly cause you cannot visually see the score lines. Will not buy again. Evercare is better.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Attention short Hair per owners; does NOT pick up pet hair
customer_reviews.text: If you have a pet at home with a short hair/fur (chihuahua owner here) please do not buy this. It absolutely does not pick up hair from clothing. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Fb1907pl

customer_reviews.title: Cat owner
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my cat sheds and likes to lay on my bed, these are good for lint and that's it, for pet hair, specifically cat hair it's useless, I don't recommend for pet owners
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peels and stick together.
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t buy again. Not sure if it’s authentic scotch, however doesn’t work like scotch I bought elsewhere. It’s peels back and stick while using it. Frustrating and wasting. Not recommending
customer_reviews.author: Mark Springer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend that instead
customer_reviews.text: These work OK, but they're not much different than a regular lint roller. They will not get out embedded pet hair. What I found that does work is the Scotch-Brite FurFighter Hair Remover Kit. I recommend that instead.
customer_reviews.author: Firebelly

customer_reviews.title: Awful... I'm shocked it's rated so highly
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the worst products I've ever purchased off Amazon. The adhesive is barely sticky to pick up cat hair. In fact, it didn't even hold itself together when I began to use it. The whole thing slowly started to unroll as I tried to roll it over my clothes. Very disappointed. This twin pack is going back.
customer_reviews.author: crc14

customer_reviews.title: So not sticky
customer_reviews.text: These pretty much suck. They're hardly even sticky and don't pick up anything after the first once over. I've already gone through one roll and it's only been a week. The rollers are large but not because they have a lot of tape on them. Not a good buy. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: CocoZee

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We now have our third Bernese Mtn dog, and I'm constantly fighting her hair on my cloths and other cloth like curtains. I cannot live without these pet hair removal rollers. Before I leave the house, I use these Scotch- Brite rollers over my clothing so I don't look like a shaggy dog myself. Ha! Definitely used frequently and a good product to have on-hand whether for lint and/or pet hair removal.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Taylor

customer_reviews.title: terrible
customer_reviews.text: i just started using one yesterday. when you tear the used one off it just keeps going. there's no indentation to tear the next one off. it just keeps going. i have to use a scissors to cut it off. what a waste. too late to return them.
customer_reviews.author: arlene hock

customer_reviews.title: hair remover
customer_reviews.text: This product is useless - it does NOT pick up hair. It was a big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: rmurley

customer_reviews.title: Not very sticky
customer_reviews.text: I have pets & long hair & was looking for a better lint roller. Because this one was designed for pets, I thought it would be good but it is hardly sticky at all. Once a little lint from my shirt gets on it, it is useless. Very disappointed. Wish I hadn't wasted my money on this one...
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lynn

customer_reviews.title: WILL REMOVE LABRADOR HAIR!
customer_reviews.text: If you share your home with a lab, you know they shed 365 days a year. They are called “Love Hairs” and we learn to live with them. They are short but hard to get rid of. These pet hair rollers work on our Lab’s deposits. Hard to find in stores, but easy to order at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are worthless! Seriously disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: These are not sticky enough to pick up anything.. and the little bit they do pick up, wastes that sheet almost immediately and you have to pull out another sheet, which doesn't tear where it is supposed to. A nightmare and a waste of money! DO NOT BUY THESE!
customer_reviews.author: Great CookTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: These are fine, but most of the time when I run them over my pants the whole sticker just unwinds and I have to roll it back up. They are sticky enough to pick up hair, but definitely more sticky to your pants than to themselves, so they unwind really easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Strasser

customer_reviews.title: Quality fail.
customer_reviews.text: If you roll two directions, this roller becomes undone. Out of 100 points, I’d give it a 60. It does what it can, but the tape is quickly filled and the sheets unravel with little use. You end up having to re roll the whole thing just to use the sections that came undone. Im sure there are better alternatives out ther for you and your pet fur.
customer_reviews.author: L. Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work, don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are awful. The sheets don’t stay in place while using it, so it sticks to to clothes while four more sheets unravel. They’re absolutely useless and I don’t recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn

customer_reviews.title: Cat hair buster!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 rescued street ferals, one is a Maine Coon mix...nuff said. Hair is attracted to any dark clothing by magnetism, this is science😂 this takes care of those pesky hairs in a jiff. A must have if you have any type of hairy,shedding fur babies.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lewis

customer_reviews.title: When you got pets-got to have this!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Scotch-Brite products, only wish they had more sheets on the refills. If you got cats that shed, this is an easy way to de-hair your favorite chair or sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Pet approved!
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it’s suppose to do. I have a Maltese that goes everywhere I do so I am always covered in long white hair. I got this 2 pack so I could have one in the house and one in the car. So far it’s picked up all the hair on my clothes and off the seat of the car and the sheets peel off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Great cling
customer_reviews.text: Great cling. Used these on my clothes and they worked very well. I also used it when I was going through chemotherapy. My hair was falling out and I used this to roll my head and remove the small hairs that would get ingrown
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Pennick

customer_reviews.title: Easy Tear-Off for Next Sheet
customer_reviews.text: I sell vintage clothes so I bought these to take care of stray lint on items before I photograph and ship my items. The positive is that it's very easy to remove the "used" piece to expose the next one. My only issue is I with they were a bit more "sticky" to pull off lint that's slightly imbedded. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: graciescottage

customer_reviews.title: High quality ,Strong adhesive & save time
customer_reviews.text: It keeps my floors neat & clean . Convenient to use it . This brand is the only one who could provide high quality product. I had tried other few brand products which I was not satisfied with them . I may stick to this brand for quite sometime .
customer_reviews.author: Rejoice

customer_reviews.title: Would Not Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: The problem is that the sheets peel off as you're rolling, so you end up wasting about 10 sheets per roll because the thing keeps unraveling! I had this problem with both rollers from the pack.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Best lint roller!
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Using for cat hair around house and clothes, even non-material furniture. I got smart and started rolling on the actual cat, it actually works and she loves it! So funny. Works better than any other lint remover I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Damaged1

customer_reviews.title: Not very sticky
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to get cat hairs off a couple of fleeces I wear, but it isn't up to the job. The sheets aren't sufficiently sticky to lift much stuff off the clothing. Would not buy again, especially as it's marketed as being specifically for pet hair.
customer_reviews.author: GoonMoon

customer_reviews.title: Great value . Works great .
customer_reviews.text: These are a must when you have pets . Great value and performance. We usually buy a 6 or or more due to the value rather than paying 6.95 for just one roller in the store. Normally we'll pay about $16-22 for a larger amount by ordering through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased numerous lint rollers and this 1 is the best! I have a Siberian Husky that sheds horribly. My family and I use this roller everyday multiple times prior to leaving the house.
customer_reviews.author: Latasha Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I expected a lot better results. To thoroughly clean my cat's bed, I would have had to use several sheets. Not very useful or economical. I got the same results with packing tape! I won't buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: NaLo Walls

customer_reviews.title: Comes apart too easily
customer_reviews.text: These lint rollers work okay, but the tape comes off while rolling. You can rip off the surrounding tape when it’s full of lint but it comes off too easily with just one roll on fabric (if that makes sense). I have to roll it back and only roll in one direction so that it won’t come undone. Won’t buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey  Hanlon

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive for a reason
customer_reviews.text: Not bad considering it was one of the least expensive options offered on Amazon. I used it to clean dog hair off my comforter and I’d go through 12-16 sheets for one cleaning. Not sure how this compares with other rollers but I went through them pretty quickly. Seemed like the sheet was finished picking up dog fur after two to three passes.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: Pet Hair and Lint Roller
customer_reviews.text: I brought this product to remove pet hair off of fabric before washing. The sheets kept unraveling making it hard to use. I had to rip the unraveled sheet and use my hand use. The adhesive could be a lot stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Glojac99

customer_reviews.title: It's the only brand of pet hair removal roller I will by from now on!
customer_reviews.text: We have a white great pyrenees who is a relentless shredder, year round. We love the Scotch brand roller because it works more effortlessly than others we have tried. I especially love the large one that is modeled after a paint roller, but that one is getting tricky to find.
customer_reviews.author: Janice M. Duran

customer_reviews.title: This roller brush works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Just received the rollers that I ordered yesterday...already tested one out and it works great. Love our cat but not too thrilled with hair on my clothes.. so the pet hair roller does exactly what I need. The tackiness of the roll is perfect for the job. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: BY

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, not the worst.
customer_reviews.text: There are better rollers out there. It is moderately sticky, but it is difficult to peel the used strip off without it tearing off part of the next strip.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Bellin

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT ON PET HAIRS
customer_reviews.text: I KEEP ONE IN THE CAR AND DESK AT HOME TO REMOVE PET HAIRS FROM KIDS THEY LOOK LIKE THERE SHADING AS MUCH AS THE DOG GET THE JOB DONE
customer_reviews.author: ben jacovini

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: The sheets tend to come undone while rolling too fast,so slow it down to fix that issue. Stickiness is pretty good but overall it’s nothing game changing. Pretty standard issue roller.
customer_reviews.author: Redline

customer_reviews.title: Good but the dollar store rollers are just as good and way cheaper
customer_reviews.text: They pick up stuff quite well. But i found way cheaper ones in dollar store that picks up just as good, but for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Khanu’s Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should
customer_reviews.text: Keep these at my sewing table. Great for the little threads that get everywhere when sewing and also for our little dog that gets hair all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Friscia

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed! Rolls very small and not sticky at all! Expected more from such a pricey product and disappointed in 3M. Don't recommend this product and will Not purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Newlove

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my niece who is starting college in less than two weeks. Can’t go to class covered in dust, hair or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Also works well on cats!
customer_reviews.text: Seems like they’ve been improved. Sturdy, picks up even pet hair. My cat lets me use it on him so he doesn’t shed so much.
customer_reviews.author: Joselle

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product
customer_reviews.text: I've never had issues with a roller brush before. This one is awful. The tape comes off while using it and also while trying to move to the next sheet it just comes apart.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne M.

customer_reviews.title: these are really sticky.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my pit bull's hair, and they work just fine. They stay stickier that others I have found. I am going to search for refills of the same brand so I don't have to go through many handles. Really does the job and I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Gimelli

customer_reviews.title: Too sticky?
customer_reviews.text: While I like how easy these sheets are to pull off when used (some other brands are impossible) this particular hair roller had the sheets unrolling and sticking to my clothes. Once they are off, you can't put them back on to the roller, so it is mostly a waste. Maybe its just my order, but I was not super pleased.
customer_reviews.author: I bought this

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: Having a Pom who sheds like crazy I find dog hair all over the place! This worked great in removing hair from my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Berger

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: These work far better than regular rollers, especially if you have pets. Compared to regular lint rollers and they don’t hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Great to remove Doggie Hair
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! I use them because we adopted a short haired doggie. Works wonders on getting hair off our clothes!!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet hair
customer_reviews.text: Just wish it didn't take a whole roll to clean up after my long hair cat. That's my cats fault though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: BEST LINT ROLLERS EVER. We have 2 dogs and a cat and these work great. I have to use 3 to 6 depending on where I have sat but over all they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Hiiroxanne

customer_reviews.title: Works well,
customer_reviews.text: It works well removing lint and dog hair from my black work clothes. I keep one at home and one in the car. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Loud and unimpressive, but get the job done
customer_reviews.text: These lint rollers don't seem as sticky as the ones I get from Walmart, and they're very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Britt W

customer_reviews.title: Not sticky enough
customer_reviews.text: I use this for pet hair and it's not as sticky as other rollers I've used. Disappointed with this brand name item.
customer_reviews.author: GradyGuy

customer_reviews.title: Does job
customer_reviews.text: Does the job....Sometimes kind of hard to tear that sheet off ..but other than that works
customer_reviews.author: kittens

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey for a piece of tape that takes hair off your clothes but it was easy and I didnt want to drive anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod Burgin

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Rollers have improved & work better than the older version. Quickly picks up all my pet hair.
customer_reviews.author: Denee

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: These tape rollers are not very sticky, and I have to use 5 sheets to get white cat hair off a black fabric chair.
customer_reviews.author: Marney

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money, it's trash
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. it can barely pick up dog hair from my coat. Wish I could give it zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saves me from so much pet hair
customer_reviews.text: If it were not for these lint rollers I would be covered in pet hair every moment of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: You need this pet lovers!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a necessity for any pet owner. Grabs hair perfectly. I always have these on hand!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer09021120

customer_reviews.title: non stick
customer_reviews.text: These are not very sticky and unfurl from the roll in one swipe. It doesn't even pick up my own hair let alone my pets hair.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Roll off fur
customer_reviews.text: Cat hair=check Dog hair =check My hair=check Strong on getting the hair off my shirts, pants, and leather and cloth car seats.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisz

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected, but could use more adhesive stickiness.
customer_reviews.text: Product works as well as you would expected too. But a little expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I have a bulldog that sheds A LOT. I am a lint-rolling maniac. These are my favorite. Sticky enough to get the job done!
customer_reviews.author: em

customer_reviews.title: They don't roll.
customer_reviews.text: These lint rollers don't roll. They just stay in place, making the work a bit more difficult. The stickiness is fine though.
customer_reviews.author: David B. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great very sticky but not to sticky to where it’s hard to take off used sheet!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Oles

customer_reviews.title: Good tape
customer_reviews.text: Got for my kid. Haven’t heard any complaints, so I’m guessing it’s all good
customer_reviews.author: T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice rollers with extra stick
customer_reviews.text: These rollers work really well. They do tend to be a bit more sticky than the 3m rollers
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Green

customer_reviews.title: My cat is pleased.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves me. My cat loves to shed. I'm allergic to my cat. This gets my cat off my clothes. My cat is pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Lee Graham

customer_reviews.title: Very good - no chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind, those other heavy duty rollers that advertise the "stickiest" have a very strong chemical odor. When using those lint rollers will leave a chemical residue on the fabric or bedding. I've tried few brands and these are my choice for my cat. There is virtually no chemical smell nor will it leave a harsh smell on the fabric. These may not be as "strong" but they are much more safe for your pets.
customer_reviews.author: Nate "Skate"

customer_reviews.title: The description says 672 sheets, this is false
customer_reviews.text: You only receive two rolls with 56 sheets each. Which is 112 sheets. The title is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: The best I've found.
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats, and the short-haired one sheds like the dickens no matter HOW much I brush and comb her. The long-haired one causes little black pills of downy fur in my completed laundry unless I use these on my clothing before the wash. I tried regular lint and fur rollers, but these perform far beyond them in my reckoning. They have ergonomic handles, the sheets are made of extremely thin, yet almost stretchy material that picks up fur magnificently, and the sheets are very easy to start without ripping unintentionally into the sheet you DON'T yet wish to use. I scoff at regular lint rollers now; these are easier to use and more effective by far.
customer_reviews.author: Call 'em as I see 'em

customer_reviews.title: ✔
customer_reviews.text: These just get the job done. A good ol lent roller.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I use these for crafting, between prepping fabrics. To helping with weeding. It works great. Great on pet hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Better than regular ones for dog hair.
customer_reviews.text: I have a husky and work in a business office so being filled with dog hair all over is not ideal. I have tried basic general rollers and wanted to try this one that is specifically designated for dog hair. It works better but I feel could still be even better? Does the job though so it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Eviea

customer_reviews.title: Good lint rollers
customer_reviews.text: Great lint rollers! I usually use them on my clothes for regular lint (I don't have pets) but I also double it to pick up hair on the bathroom floor so I don't have to sweep it up. Really good for that and is a lazy hack for "sweeping" a bathroom floor of two females that have long hair! Hahah, I'm sure it'd work wonders on pet hair as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: When you go to roll it on your clothes, it wants to unroll from the handle. This is because it’s so barely sticky, it won’t even stick to itself. Don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jackson

customer_reviews.title: horribly over priced
customer_reviews.text: We thought this was the extra thick roll. it is NOT. It is the cheap, small roll.
customer_reviews.author: jlu

customer_reviews.title: Great sticky sheets
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have a small zoo roaming our house (3 cats and 1 dog) which inevitably leave fur everywhere. I bought these to run over my wool jacket so that I don't have to constantly get it dry cleaned. They do a great job on the jacket and on my couch. Will definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This may be a good product
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was two two-packs but it is sold only as a two-pack. It seems expensive to me so I am sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kodgis

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to rip off new sheets
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the stickiness is pretty great, but peeling the sheet and ripping off the old one is a PITA almost every time. You'll either pull off some of the next sheet, or just tear around the perforated markings.
customer_reviews.author: Jay M

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: They dont work. I have a corgi that sheds sooo much and I have to use up around 6 sheets to take any hair off my leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Buy Evercare Instead
customer_reviews.text: Trash - like other have said doesn’t pick up hair that well. You get 3 passes then you need a new sheet. Buy Evercare giant roller from Walmart so much better. Like will never buy anything else again.
customer_reviews.author: James P. Milam

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not great
customer_reviews.text: Not very sticky. These don't pick up dog hair as well as regular lint rollers. They do pick up some hair just not as well as others.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Unrolls itself otherwise works well
customer_reviews.text: Poor stickiness leads to the thing unrolling itself as you roll up and down your clothing. Have not had this issue with other rollers. Works as expected when the roll stays together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so sticky
customer_reviews.text: Not very sticky! I use multiple sheets to clean one garment.
customer_reviews.author: sssssssssa1a

customer_reviews.title: What a Pick-up
customer_reviews.text: Have a long-haired dog that seems to be constantly shedding. The Scotch-Brite Pet Hair Roller easily picks up every bit of dog hair with minimal effort. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ford

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work for me!
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work for me, maybe another case it would work but I couldn't get cat hairs off from my chair.
customer_reviews.author: eylem

customer_reviews.title: Buy regular, pet doesn’t work better.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work any better for animal hair but costs a lot more. Just use regular Scotch Lint roller. Seems wrong for a company to market a product as specialty when it’s not.
customer_reviews.author: roxanne m harris

customer_reviews.title: Repurchased Many Times
customer_reviews.text: I love these pet lint rollers. I've been using them for years and even use them directly on my dog as it works better than brushing her (and it's safe for her). I've tried the regular lint rollers but they just don't seem to work as well on my pet's hair.
customer_reviews.author: Irminguarde

customer_reviews.title: No better than regular scotch-brite rollers.
customer_reviews.text: I tried these specifically because they're marketed as "pet hair" specific. They work fine but no better than your average scotch-brite rollers.
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Work as described. Stickier than other brands, also tear easy for next use
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream...just too expensive
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lint roller I've found. They just cost so damn much!
customer_reviews.author: Don W. Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Could this be the best roller in the world?
customer_reviews.text: Yes, these rollers really are amazing. If you've EVER used an old school roller you might be afraid to try these but the 3m adhesive makes this an exceptional lint/hair remover and the plastic material means it's EASY and FAST to pull off a new sheet every time. The new handle design is also extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S.

customer_reviews.title: They do what they're supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about this lint roller? Well, it picks up lint and pet hair off my clothes just like a lint roller is supposed to. It is better than some of the super cheap lint rollers I've bought in the past because 1) the roll of sticky stuff doesn't start to come off of the dispenser/roller thing while I'm rolling, 2) the sheets of sticky paper are easier to peel off of the roll than the kind that are more papery (these ones are like sticky plastic sheets), 3) I guess the roller handle is pretty ergonomic. SO yeah, as far as lint rollers go, this one is good.
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: Adequate, but not great
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping these would be stickier since they're designed for pet hair, but they aren't quite as sticky as I would like. Still works pretty good for getting most pet hair off of your clothes or furniture, provided the hair is not woven into the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: The sheets roll off while you use it
customer_reviews.text: waste of money. Every time I use the roller, the sheets just come off the roller making it impossible to use it for its purpose. I will never purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: malee

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I went to use this product and the entire thing came unraveled!!! Total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: lexi

customer_reviews.title: I have tried every product out there and these tried and true rollers work the best. I have one by the back door so ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs and two cats so pet hair is the bane of my existence especially because I wear a lot of black, I have tried every product out there and these tried and true rollers work the best. I have one by the back door so I can do a quick sweep before leaving the house!
customer_reviews.author: sguerney

product_meta.title: Scotch-Brite Pet Hair & Lint Roller, Twin Pack, Works Great On Pet Hair, 2 Rollers, 56 Sheets Per Roller, 112 Sheets Total
product_meta.description:
Look fabulous from day until night with the Scotch-Brite Lint Roller, your little secret weapon. Whether you have a furry friend at home, or you simply need to freshen up before a big meeting, this lint roller picks up fur, fluff and other stuff so you can put your best foot forward. The ergonomic handle fits comfortably in your hand and the roller makes quick touchups a snap. Plus, it's equipped with Scotch Brand adhesive so you know you can rely on it to get the job done. Stash the Scotch-Brite Lint Roller in your home, car and office to look great wherever you go.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Effectively picks up lint and pet hair from clothing, furniture and beyond.
feature_bullets: Picks up lint, fur, fuzz, hair and debris for a crisp, clean look
Tears cleanly down to the last sheet
Great for use on clothing, furniture and more
Handle is ergonomically designed to fit comfortably in your hand
